original_text: And thy life shall hang in doubt before thee; and thou shalt fear day and night, and shalt have none assurance of thy life:
korean_text: 네 생명이 위험에 처하고 주야로 두려워하며 네 생명을 확신할 수 없을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And thy life shall hang in doubt before thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 생명이 네 앞에서 의심 속에 달릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and thou shalt fear day and night
and shalt have none assurance of thy life
sentences.korean_translation: 네 생명에 대한 확신을 갖지 못하리라
